item.title: Patriots Portfolio: Budget 2026 Deep Dive â€” Where Is the $1.588 Trillion Actually Going?
item.description: This week’s Patriots Portfolio breaks down the biggest budget stories: the $1.588 trillion allocation, tourism boom, gold sector resurrection, cash grants debate, and what it all means for ordinary Guyanese trying to build wealth in the fastest-growing economy in the world.
